other_tests.findings: Normal major papilla; successful cannulation of biliary duct; CBD and CHD measured 5mm in diameter; non-dilated left and right hepatics and intrahepatics; possible filling defect consistent with sludge noted in distal CBD; no evidence of strictures or stones; cystic duct and neck of gallbladder well visualized; scant sludge observed during balloon sweeps; completion occlusion cholangiogram revealed no further filling defects.
